column2: "<%me>, sorry to bother you, but... Could you help me with my task?"
"It seems that a massive number of Darkers appeared on planet Amduscia, and now the Dragonkin are going berserk."
"But there's a limit to what I can do for the Dragonkin myself..."
"<%me>, will you come with me? For the Dragonkin... I'm begging you!!"
